fields.summary: Console should support ELB 2016-08 predefined security policy

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description:
We should update our predefined SSL security policies to include support for the new 2016-08 policy.

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/classic/elb-security-policy-table.html
fields.summary: ELB should support 2016-08 predefined SSL security policy

comments.body: May need a console update, too, [~jloza].
The new ELBs will have 2016-08 predefined security policy by default for HTTPS listener.
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
